page.title: 04 Employment
page.content: {My Dad It is 3.15 AM,my dad is getting up.He makes his flask and sandwiches,has a wash and of he goes to his lorry,a Volvo F12 articulated. Today he his taking wheat to Gloucester for Mr F who owns the lorries and arable land of a few thousand acres. When he has tipped his load he returns to the drier,reloads for Budley,on his return he loads for morning. After tea he works in the garden then feeds the dogs,and checks that the bantam hen is still sitting on the maran eggs.Soon he comes to sit down with us whilst mum goes to see the horses. Mum comes back,and before bed they discuss the prospects of the horses for the Royal Show.
